Detailed Description

The main application class.

Member Function Documentation

wxString Application::GetAppName (  )  const

Returns the application name (APPNAME).

Required by wxStandardPaths::GetUserDataDir

wxString Application::GetFeedsPath (  )  const

Returns the path on disk to store all feed related data for the logged in user.

Precondition:
the Twitter login credentials must be set (via Login or Twitter::SetAuth)

Twitter& Application::GetTwitter (  )  [inline]

Returns the Twitter client controlling the connection.

void Application::Login ( const wxString &  user,
const wxString &  pass 
)

Sets the auth info for the twitter account and shows the main panel.

Does not do any verification that the user/password is valid; use Twitter::VerifyCredentials

See also:
Twitter::VerifyCredentials
Precondition:
login credentials have been verified
Postcondition:
main window is shown
Parameters:
user the username
pass the Twitter account password

Here is the call graph for this function:

void Application::Logout (  ) 

Logs out of the Twitter account by showing the login panel.

Does not actually talk to the Twitter server to formally "log out".

Precondition:
user is logged in (main window is shown)
Postcondition:
login window is shown

Here is the call graph for this function:

int Application::OnExit (  ) 

Called when the application exits.

Cleans up twitter objects and deserializes all settings and data.

Here is the call graph for this function:

bool Application::OnInit (  ) 

Initialization code.

void Application::OpenUrl ( const wxString &  url  )  [static]

Opens a URL in the default browser.

Uses default browser settings (Firefox can be set to open in a new tab)

Parameters:
url the URL to open in the browser
